name: The Fall of Nemesis: Clash of the Kaijujin
blurb: An online fighting game for 1-4 giant monsters (Kaiju).  Mix & Match classics like Godzilla, Gamera, etc. with fan originals!

rewards.reward: Get $5 store credit in the Kaiju Combat Merchandise store!  You don't actually select this reward - it is given automatically to anyone who pledges $1 or more ABOVE their selected reward.  Anyone who added-on PROJECT: NEMESIS for $8 or grabbed the IMMORTAL KAIJU reward for $200 - you've got this already!
BABY KAIJU - Every dollar counts!  Thank you for contributing!
YOUNG KAIJU - You are officially a member of the design team!  Get a special "Design Team Member" badge on your forum avatar, and become eligible to vote on roster, features, budgeting, and more!
JUNIOR KAIJU - In addition to joining the design team, you are eligible for a free copy of Kaiju Combat upon release.  Get your battle on!

LITERATE KAIJU - Join the design team, get a free copy of Kaiju Combat upon release, and get an electronic copy of the new kaiju novel PROJECT: NEMESIS by Jeremy Robinson!\r\n\r\n(Other reward tiers may add a copy of the novel to their reward package by adding $8 to their pledge)

KAIJU SPONSOR 1 - Sponsor an original kaiju concept (yours or someone else's) for inclusion in Kaiju Combat!  One sponsored kaiju will be submitted to our creative team (exactly like the $500 PROGENITOR KAIJU reward) for every $500 pledged in this way.  You'll also get your design team login, and a free copy of Kaiju Combat upon release
KAIJU TWINS - Get two design team logins, and TWO copies of Kaiju Combat upon release!  Now your lazy friend has no excuse not to tear up Tokyo with you in tandem!

BATTLE KAIJU - A free copy of all future Kaiju Combat releases!  Get a design team login, and a free copy of every Kaiju Combat release we ever make!  Every new monster, environment, game mode - or anything else we create as part of the Kaiju Combat project will be yours!

KAIJU SPONSOR 2 - Sponsor an original kaiju concept (yours or someone else's) for inclusion in Kaiju Combat!  One sponsored kaiju will be submitted to our creative team (exactly like the $500 PROGENITOR KAIJU reward) for every $500 pledged in this way.  You'll also get your design team login, and a free copy of every Kaiju Combat game we release!

CONTROLLER KAIJU - Have the control you need!  Get a copy of EVERY Kaiju Combat game we release, plus a design team login, PLUS a brand-new Logitech\u00ae F710 Wireless Gamepad to crush the competition with! Made possibly by the Kaiju-lovers at Logitech\u00ae - (limit of 25)

BETA KAIJU - Start playing the game early!  Get a design team login, a copy of every Kaiju Combat game ever, and get exclusive access to the beta several weeks before launch!  Your feedback will help shape the final form &  balance of the game, plus you'll have a leg up on all the competition!

IMMORTAL KAIJU - Have your likeness, voice, or some other self-representation added to the single-player story.\r\nTHIS DOES *NOT* include any previous rewards!  (You may add $200 to your pledge amount when selecting any other reward level to add the IMMORTAL KAIJU benefit.)

ALPHA KAIJU - Get into the game in the pre-balance phase!  Get a design team login, a copy of every Kaiju Combat game ever, and start getting alpha builds a few months before release!  You'll help us refine & expand our combat mechanics in the final weeks of development, and get a (terrifying) look behind the development curtain!

PROGENITOR KAIJU - Add your own monster!  Submit your original monster concept to the creative team at Sunstone Games, who will work closely with you to create professional design documents and concept art for your monster.  Once finished, your monster is eligible to become a fully playable fighting character in a future Kaiju Combat release!  (Limit of 50)\r\nYes, you still get your design team login, copy of the game, beta & alpha access too!

COMIC KAIJU - Be featured in a mini-comic by Matt Frank!  You (or a human of your choice) will star in an exclusive mini-comic featuring several of our original Kaiju.  The comic will depict some of the events which happen before the main Kaiju Combat storyline.  As an elite backer you also get your design team login, a copy of every release, and early access to the game.

ASSOCIATE PRODUCER - Get a solo listing in the Kaiju Combat credits.  You will also be invited to join in on Sunstone Games staff meetings where we make studio-level decisions.  As an elite backer you also get your design team login, a copy of every release, and early access to the game.

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER - Get a solo listing in the Kaiju Combat credits. You will also be invited to join in on Sunstone Games staff meetings where we make studio-level decisions. As an elite backer you also get your design team login, a copy of every release, and early access to the game.
